entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
